title: Mug, 1820–30
provenance: McKearin's Antiques, Hoosick Falls, NY; 1958 Phelps Warren, NY.
description: Beaker shape, tapered at middle; scalloped base; loop handle cut with notches; sides cut with band of tall diamonds with central printies, the central panel engraved "Erinerung."

tombstone.epitaph:
Mug, 1820–30.
1820–30. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-90.
